sentences.english: She is a notorious gossiper here, who is very fond of dishing the dirt about others.
sentences.chinese: 她特別喜歡說別人的閒話，是我們這出了名的長舌婦。

sentences.english: You could almost describe them as ‘gossips’.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以把他們形容爲長舌婦。

sentences.english: She is a gossip and often speaks evil of others.
sentences.chinese: 她是個長舌婦，經常說別人的壞話。

sentences.english: That blabbermouth that runs the cash register at the store?
sentences.chinese: 記得那商店收銀的長舌婦嗎？

sentences.english: The alacrity bright loquacious woman, loquacious get vexed person.
sentences.chinese: 活潑開朗長舌婦，嘮叨得煩人。

sentences.english: She is well known as a yenta in this neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 她是這一帶遠近聞名的長舌婦。

sentences.english: She is a notorious gossiper here; who is very fond of dishing the dirt just around others.
sentences.chinese: 她特別喜好說他人的閒話，是我們這出了名的長舌婦。

sentences.english: The two gossips, when coming together, would tittle-tattle to the slander of others.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個長舌婦，碰到一起時總要喋喋不休地誹謗別人。

sentences.english: She told her story to Closer, a scandal rag.
sentences.chinese: 她把這事告訴給了一個密友，一個長舌婦。

sentences.english: She is a woman who likes to tittle-tattle.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個喜歡東家長西家短的長舌婦。

sentences.english: She is a notorious gossiper here, who is very fond of dishing the dirt about others.
sentences.chinese: 她出格喜歡說別人的閒話，是我們這出了名的長舌婦。

sentences.english: That gossip knew the fault he made before and always rub his nose in it.
sentences.chinese: 那長舌婦知道他以前的過錯，常常揭他的底。

definition: lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
to whisper to one another's ear
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1
